about.title: ABOUT US
about.text1: MADBITE was born in 2020 with a revolutionary vision in the world of burgers. Our passion led us to be recognized in the Michelin Bib Gourmand Guide 2025, an achievement that celebrates our constant pursuit of culinary excellence.
about.text2: We are proud to offer 100% natural meat, daily baked artisan breads, and homemade sauces that will make every bite an unforgettable experience.
